titles.title: To prohibit the reduction, elimination, or suspension of funding for land-grant colleges and universities.
To prohibit the reduction, elimination, or suspension of funding for land-grant colleges and universities.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Agriculture, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
